channel.title: Subnet Overlapping on ExitCode0
channel.description: Recent content in Subnet Overlapping on ExitCode0

item.title: How to enable subnet overlapping on a Fortigate
item.description:
A short and sweet problem/resolution. If you are looking to enable subnet overlapping on a Fortigate so that you can give multiple interfaces an IP in the same subnet, this is the post for you.

NOTE: This feature can only be enabled in the Fortigateâ€™s CLI. To enable the overlapping feature, enter the following commands:

config system settings
set allow-subnet-overlap [enable/disable]
end
